title: Poseidon's Falls
description: A stranger washed up from on the shores of a tempestuous river.A Prince of the blood who finds him.As the two come together, they quickly learn that the circumstances of their meeting is not quite as simple as they seem, and a choice has to be made that will either destroy them both or shatter the customs of their kingdom.Set in an imagined kingdom in Ancient Greece, in a time of Gods and Oracles, "Poseidon's Falls" takes its protagonists on a journey where lies, half-truths, and secrets lead to an unexpected bond in a place where nothing is quite as it ought to be.
author: Simona Niles
